content.raw:
Change the major version of a dependency is usually a bad idea for the stability of a package and all the software build on top. I’m interested into knowing the use case for this change.

A major change in cmake2 is to require cmake `3.10.2` which is not available on Ubuntu Xenial so this change will make us to cancel the xenial series of ign-transport5.
